name: vulnerability_index
label: Vulnerability Index
description:
Vulnerability factors/indicators: 
This resulted in the following weights:
20%   Poverty: Poverty incidence
20%   Gender: Female-headed household
10%   Age: Population below 8-years
10%   Age: population 65+,Â 
10 %  type of construction: permanent wall type
10 %  type of construction: permanent roof type
20%   Refugees legal status #of a displaced person
The vulnerability indicators have been scored on a scale of 1 (low vulnerability) to 10 (high vulnerability).

name: poverty_incidence
label: Poverty incidence
description: Alpha version 2011 estimates of proportion of people per grid square living in poverty, as defined by $2 a day thresholds. Tatem AJ, Gething PW, Bhatt S, Weiss D and Pezzulo C (2013) Pilot high resolution poverty maps, University of Southampton/Oxford.
